Package b2bpl.bytecode.analysis

Contains classes related to the analysis of Java bytecode.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BasicBlock Concrete subclass of an AbstractVertex to be used in conjunction with the Edge class in the ControlFlowGraph of a bytecode method.
BasicBlock.InstructionIterator Simple iterator for the bytecode instructions of this basic block.
CFGBuilder Builds up a ControlFlowGraph for a given bytecode method.
ControlFlowGraph Concrete subclass of an AbstractFlowGraph to be used as the control flow graph of bytecode methods.
Edge Concrete subclass of an AbstractEdge to be used in conjunction with the BasicBlock class in the ControlFlowGraph of a bytecode method.
FlowAnalyzer Performs the dataflow analysis on a given bytecode method.
FlowAnalyzer.Verifier Specialization of a SimpleVerifier which uses the class repository of the translator to lookup the type information required during the dataflow analysis.
SemanticAnalyzer  
SemanticAnalyzer.BMLAnalyzer  
SemanticAnalyzer.InstructionAnalyzer  
StackFrame Simple class representing a JVM stack frame.
 

Package b2bpl.bytecode.analysis Description

Contains classes related to the analysis of Java bytecode.

Most classes are related to the flow analysis of bytecode methods:

  • The ControlFlowGraph class provides a simple implementation of a control flow graph whose vertices and edges are represented by the BasicBlock and Edge classes, respectively. In addition, the ControlFlowGraph class also embodies a set of loop analysis algorithms. The actual construction of a ControlFlowGraph for a given bytecode method is performed by the CFGBuilder class.
  • The FlowAnalyzer class performs a dataflow analysis on a given bytecode method and is based on the analysis framework of the ASM bytecode library. The flow analysis results in the computation of the StackFrames at the individual bytecode instructions.
In addition, a SemanticAnalyzer is provided which performs a semantic analysis on a whole bytecode class including BML specifications.
